```{r setup, include=FALSE}

  error      = FALSE,

source(file.path("C:", "LlorR", "scripts", "lor_main.R"))
```

```{r load-data}
summary_info <- readr::read_rds(file = file.path("C:", "LlorR", "data", "clean","summary_info.rds") )
hourly_prevs_plot <- readr::read_rds(file = file.path("C:", "LlorR", "data", "clean","hourly_prevs_plot.rds") )
hourly_prevs_line <- readr::read_rds(file = file.path("C:", "LlorR", "data", "clean","hourly_prevs_line.rds") )

meta_7days <- readr::read_rds(file = file.path("C:", "LlorR", "data", "clean","meta_week.rds") )
react_24hrs <- readr::read_rds(file = file.path("C:", "LlorR", "data", "clean","react_24hrs.rds") )
```

```{r constants}
last_update_box <- flexdashboard::valueBox(
  Sys.Date(), 
  caption = glue::glue("Last Update / Usually done around 5:00 UTC / 7:00 CET"), 
  icon = "fa-clock", 
  color = "#1A9850"
)

number_games <- flexdashboard::valueBox(
    value = glue::glue("{summary_info$nGames} Ranked Games"), 
    caption = glue::glue("min 5 games - {summary_info$nMu} games used"), 
    icon = "fa-table", 
    color = "#FA7404"
  )
  
number_players = flexdashboard::valueBox(
    glue::glue("{summary_info$nPlayers}"), 
    caption = glue::glue("World Players"), 
    icon = "fa-medal", 
    color = "#65c0a9"
  )

seq_date <- seq(lubridate::as_datetime(params$start), floor_date(lubridate::now(), unit = "day")+hours(18) , "day") #
```

### LMI - Tiers

```{r info-gt-lmi}
tribble( 
  ~Tier, ~Note, 
  "Best Choice ~ T0", "with LMI >= 97.5", 
  "Good ~T1", "with LMI in [85, 97.5)", 
  "Could do better ~T2", "with LMI in [50, 85)", 
  "Meh, either bad or not played/ignored ~T3", "with LMI < 50"
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  tab_header(
    title = glue::glue("LMI Tiers")
  ) |>
  gtExtras::gt_theme_nytimes()
```

### General info

When I refer to games it's always refering a single playerDeck. So, if I have the information of 1 match it's equivalent to 2 games.
